title: Ahangama Rice Paddy View House
details: Ahangama Rice Paddy View House- Beautiful views across the paddy fields, and well located close to Ahangama beach town, only an 8 minute walk to the beach. This land is slightly elevated above the paddy fields, wooded with fabulous tropical mature fruit trees and in addition there is a small house presently inhabited by the owners. This area is very sought after by foreign expats due to the number of beautiful heritage houses and of course the proximity to the sandy beaches of the immediate area that attract a growing number of international surfers.
